values.description:

values.description:
Websites need content. From destination guides to itineraries, placeholder text to punchy reviews, we can deliver web content written in line with your SEO needs. By creating writing teams – all accountable to an editor – we can prepare hundreds of pages of content with ease. Getting your new page online is never easy, so entrust the content delivery to us. Our range of SEO services and packages combine captivating copy with proven SEO knowledge, ensuring that your web pages are liked as much by your visitors as they are by Google.

Element is a copywriting & SEO specialist with offices in Brighton (UK) and Perth (Australia).

The company was founded by four industry veterans, with over 40 years collective experience, to produce high quality games for multiple platforms - both developing their own IP and undertaking project based work.

values.description:
Pebble Productions is a full service creative event management agency. 

We deliver integrated sustainable solutions for corporate parties, conferences and meetings, live communications, charity events, awards shows, product launches, press events and team building days.

We do more than simply manage events, we deliver powerful and memorable experiences that help you communicate key messages to your staff, the press, consumers, clients and stakeholders alike.

And, most importantly of all, we are committed to making our events more sustainable through the implementation of sustainable management systems and greener cleaner event solutions.

As part of our commitment to CSR, we have adopted two legacy projects and we will be making quarterly donations to support the work of Solar Aid and Nourish Farm, a local Community Interest Group in Brighton. 

For your peace of mind, we offer a Quality Standards Guarantee, so you can be sure that we will always deliver on budget, on time and above your expectations.
values.name: Pebble Productions Ltd

values.description:
Production of Award-Winning Features, B2B & B2C Corporate Videos, Charity Films and Shorts.

Corporate and charity clients have included THE DORCHESTER COLLECTION hotel group, OZWALD BOATENG, Made in Africa, Nottm Community Housing Association, Nottm City Council, Derby Homes, Natural Environmental Research Council, Royal Swedish Academy of Sciences, Exeid, STEP, The Workers' Educational Association and Groundworks.

With our ULTRABAND service and FTP, we are able to deliver huge files at tremendous speeds (up to 1Gb/s), cutting out time delays on those all important deadlines and beating our competition.

Their BAFTA nominated début feature, LONDON TO BRIGHTON earned them the Best Achievement in Production award at the 2006 British Independent Film Awards and a nomination at the London Critics Circle Film Awards for British Film Producers of the Year. It has since been named by TimeOut London as one of the top 100 British films of all time.

Other production credits include BETTER THINGS, the critically acclaimed debut feature film by Duane Hopkins (Cannes Film Festival - Critics Week 2008), Alexis Dos Santos’ UNMADE BEDS, (Sundance Film Festival, Berlin International Film Festival) and Justin Molotnikov’s CRYING WITH LAUGHTER (Best Film at BAFTA Scotland 2009).

Documentary feature film A MAN’S STORY chronicles twelve years in the life of British designer and fashion icon Ozwald Boateng. It was released in the UK in January 2012 and is released in the US in November 2012.
values.name: Wellington Films

values.description:
In 2008 Sophie Martin, former Head Chef at ‘Occasional Cuisine’ formed 'Dinner Parties to go' specialising in gourmet canapes and meals cooked in the home. As business expanded it was decided in 2011 that we should rebrand as Sophie Martin Catering, hoping to reflect the diverse range of catering we offer, and the personal touch that Sophie puts in.

We can cater for dinner parties, birthdays, anniversaries, christenings, weddings, funerals or any other event. 

We can supply a large variety of different meal options, some examples being buffets, sandwiches, afternoon teas and hog roasts. If you're looking for special canapés we have a variety of hot or cold, sweet or savory. 
Try our exceptional hand crafted canapés, perfection in one bite!

Whether you want your food delivered with the appropriate serving instructions or a chef to cook in your kitchen, we can accommodate your wishes. Maybe you would like serving staff? We can provide a friendly and experienced team.

Contact us to discuss your requirements, we can personalize each of our menus to suit any budget or dietary needs. We can even create a menu for a special themed night!
We deliver within a 35mile radius of Haslemere. See our coverage map below: we deliver to Portsmouth, Brighton, Basingstoke, Reading, Kingston, Greater London and everywhere in between. Delivery charges apply depending on order quantity. We will deliver and cater in other areas too, please call us for a quote.
values.name: Sophie Martin Catering

As inter-disciplinary designers, we work across the full design spectrum to deliver a total design package for residential and commercial projects.

Xobo Design comprises four divisions: Xobo Architecture, Xobo Interiors, Xobo Furniture and Xobo Graphics. Each division is led by an experienced designer who shares the Xobo ideals of bringing together creative thinking while remaining mindful of our client’s brief and budget.

values.description:
Platinum Lace is one of the largest brand operators of Gentlemen's Club in the United Kingdom. With venues in London, Norwich, Glasgow, Leicester and Brighton.

Platinum Lace prides itself on being of the latest generation of clubs and entertainment for the adult lifestyle making the venues a hybrid of club culture and sensual entertainment for both men and women.

Platinum Lace have over the past supplied hostesses for Poppy Appeal (Canary Wharf, Twickenham & Stamford Bridge Boxing Dinner), Help For Heroes, Villas4Veterans, Debra and most recently Lords Cricket Ground. We also supply Frank Warren's Boxing events with hostesses and ring girls for Sky Sports. The venues across the UK also support local events and charities within their own area. 

The brand is more than a venue, its becoming a lifestyle.
values.name: Platinum Lace Bar & Gentlemen's Club

values.description:
Mr Bongo started life in 1989 as a small record shop underneath Daddy Kool’s Reggae Store on Berwick Street in London.  It was the first shop to sell vinyl releases from independent hip hop labels such as Def Jam, Rawkus, Nervous and Big Beat outside of the USA.  It also established itself as the standard bearer for hard-to-find, classic Latin music, particularly Brazilian, outside of the Americas.

Over the following years it moved three times within Soho and opened in Shibuya, Japan. Mr Bongo moved its offices to Brighton in 1999 and closed all shops in 2003 to turn its focus online.

The label now has a recording roster featuring some of the best Brazilian, Latin, reggae, African and Jazz music by artists including Terry Callier, Jorge Ben, Seu Jorge, Prince Fatty, Incredible Bongo Band and Marcos Valle.  

Mr Bongo has a publishing arm with an in-house team that produces and licenses music for use by third parties including advertising, film and TV companies worldwide; brands such as Bacardi, Nike, Adidas, Fosters, Nissan and Guinness have used Mr Bongo music.  They also deal with worldwide royalty collection for artists and organizations.

In 2004 Mr Bongo began releasing films, a venture that grew to compliment the music.  In keeping with the record labels philosophy, titles are carefully selected and sourced from around the world and now include essential works by esteemed directors including as Scorsese, Coppola, Has, Bertolucci, Rocha and Dovzhenko amongst others.
values.name: Mr Bongo Worldwide

values.description:
London based Dr J is a commercial photographer specialising in Events and Performance (Theatre and Film stills) and is also available for Headshots for Artists and Business Professionals.

Working in London, Brighton, and in Sweden in both Stockholm and Upsalla, she has photographed in venues like Royal Covent Garden Opera House, Royal Festival Hall, Bistrotheque, and The Royal Vauxhall Tavern, Battersea Arts Centre, Soho Theatre and has worked with artists including Dorian Wood, Our Lady J, Justin Bond, Bourgeois and Maurice, Scottee, Jonny Woo, Josephine Wilson, Jet Moon, Mister Meredith, and Michael Twaits.
values.name: Photos by Dr J
Austin Post
values.description:
We are the Austin Post, and so – for that matter – are you. 

We started the Austin Post in July 2009 as we watched, with a mix of sadness and fascination, at the slow unraveling of the traditional newspaper business.

We believe that newspapers play a critical role in the democratic process.  That they help frame the conversation, and encourage informed debate and decision-making.

But we also recognize that the traditional newspaper model doesn’t work in the age of the Internet.  And this issue is even more acute when it comes to local news.  Many communities are facing the prospect of life without a local paper.

But while the Internet creates problems for the traditional model of local journalism, it also creates opportunities for a new kind of newspaper that can play the same critical democratic role – perhaps even more effectively.

And that’s why we started the Austin Post – a not-for-profit, community-centric newspaper that leverages the very same technology changes that have created the so-called “crisis of journalism.” 

The Austin Post is a venture of the Trilogy Employee Foundation, the charitable arm of Trilogy Enterprises – one of Austin’s first and longest-lived technology firms.  We have a small team led by Trilogy President Scott Brighton and our Editor, Karie Meltzer.  Feel free to reach out to either of us with thoughts, suggestions, or frustrations at scott@austinpost.org and karie@austinpost.org.

CKA is a woman-owned, SDB 8(a) corporation, incorporated and headquartered in Reston VA. CKA provides systems integration solutions to our federal customers.

     Customer satisfaction is the foundation of our business. We focus upon trust, responsibility, and a firsthand understanding of our customer, their requirements, and their missions. Currently, we provide design, implementation, and O&M support for the Enterprise SAN for the Pentagon Renovation and Construction Program (PENREN) to support the Defense Continuity Integrated Network/Pentagon Continuity Information System (DCIN/PCIS).

     We played a major role in the O&M support for the disaster recovery of critical data to support the Continuity of Operations (COOP) and Continuity of Business (COB) for the Washington Headquarter Services (WHS), Office of Secretary of Defense (OSD), Defense Messaging Systems (DMS), Joint Chief of Staffs, Army Operations Center, and other DoD agencies.

     We have expertise of providing solutions on software development, data warehouse, database, server and network administration. Our customers include:

US Department of Army (ITA-DC)
WHS PENREN
EMC
Thomson Financial
Evergreen Enterprise
Coagmentum Corp.
Brighton Systems
values.name: CKA, LLC.
